name: Chameleon
author: Alucard648
info: Camouflaging enemy. Made on request by SkyFlare
description: OoA Chameleon Moves like Gel. If it stays on same colored combo for some time, it becomes invisible and invincible. Otherwise it needs some time to change CSet to CSet of combo he is on.
setup: Random rate, hunger, homing factor, halt rate and step speed are used.Attribute 1 - Time needed for adaptation, in frames. Attribute 2 - Enemy X size.Attribute 3 - Enemy Y size.
